title: Result Of Talking Too Much (Part 2)
body:
Result Of Talking Too Much (Part 2)

Because of the firewall that stopped the sky-lighting claw for a moment, Evan broke free from Gloria's illusion attack.

He quickly jumped back to evade the lighting but the sky-lighting claw still struck him.

'Fu*k, now I know the feeling of villains in those movies who messed up because of talking too much, luckily I evaded more than half of the power of that attack otherwise I was done for ' Evan thought while falling down from the mountain.

Even though he was falling down from the mountain, and was feeling stinging pain all over his body there was a smile on his face.

"I will turn into a digital ghost and will hunt all of you down hahaha" Evan shouted the last line of the villain before he disappeared in the darkness.

When they saw Evan falling down from the mountain the balance finally crumbled.

ROAR -!!

The sabertooth tiger roared out loud and attacked Valery who was nearest to it.
